column4: one day, my usb devices just stopped mounting. any idea what's up?
!pmount
!mount
how do i mount usb devices?
and that's all i need
mount?
not the one i was thinking of... it listed usb devices
that's the one, awesome
didn't see it before, ty
have you updated a library recently?
change any configuration?
some configs, downloaded a lot of libs for compiling
well :P
well, thing is, this happens on every single ubuntu install i've ever had, regardless of what i do to it
hm
on different hardware?
and would a few new libs really remove usb support?
yes
i don't know exactly, but bugs happen...
if a certain library that usb hardware depended on had a bug in it or changed its configuration it could make it stop working
shit... and idea on how to reverse that?
'cause i've tried pmount'ing everything in /dev, and nothing worked
so it happens. but i don't know what's up, if it's happening on different hardware sounds like a ubuntu-specific issue. try ubuntuforums.org
